name: C-programming
description: Explore C-language programming concepts for building low-level system software and applications.

name: Web Development
description: Explore web development technologies and frameworks for building dynamic and interactive websites.

name: Mobile Development
description: Discover mobile development platforms and tools for creating native and cross-platform mobile applications.

name: Data Science
description: Learn about data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling techniques in the field of data science.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Learn about cybersecurity concepts and techniques for protecting systems and networks from cyber attacks.

name: Blockchain
description: Discover blockchain technologies and platforms for building secure and transparent digital transactions.
